about_the_game:
You are a messenger, your task is to deliver an important telegram to the command of the Solovetsky region, but upon arrival in the local town it turns out that not all its inhabitants are happy about your arrival.
You will have to uncover the secrets of this gloomy wilderness and understand what happened here.

Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a small provincial town of the early XX century. Communicate with locals, fight with enemies and explore the town and its surroundings.

Features:

  • alternative version of the story in a dieselpunk setting
  • stylized graphics
  • moral choices that influence the plot

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains opponents that the main character can kill with bladed weapons or firearms. Also, some locations have a mysterious and gloomy atmosphere.

short_description: Detective adventure game, the events of which unfold in an alternate reality of the early XX century. Explore a distant provincial town, uncover its dark secrets and fight the unknown. The fate of the town and maybe the whole world depends on you!
